hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #the Requiem of Spirit# and #a Green Rupee#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the path to #Morpha#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Piece of Heart#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##the Death Mountain Crater## has #0# major items.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #the Deku Tree# is a foolish choice.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #Nayru's Love#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Light Trial Second Right Chest

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #wooden walls# in the Shadow Temple hide...^ #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Spike Walls Left Chest

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Megaton Hammer# can be found in #Goron City#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

HC (Malon).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that ##the Spirit Temple## has #4# major items.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that a #cow behind webs# in a grotto gifts #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #storm within Gerudo's Fortress# reveals a #generic grotto#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #a Piece of Heart# can be found in #the Haunted Wasteland#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Arrows (5 pieces)# and #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: Hey! Wait! Don't go out! It's unsafe!^Wild Pokmon live in tall grass!^You need your own Pokmon for your protection.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Din's Fire#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that the #frozen cavern# echoes with #a Bottom of the Well Compass#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the path to #the Tower#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the way of the hero.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that ##the Desert Colossus## has #1# major item.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Prelude of Light#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say Goron fabrics protect against more than fire.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that Mido is easily confused by sick flips.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Trail# is on the path to #Twinrova#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that a #pool of lava# in Goron City blocks the way to #3 Deku Scrubs#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Piece of Heart#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Din's Fire#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Prelude of Light#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #a Wallet#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #Arrows (10 pieces)# and #a Blue Rupee#.
